review: "Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, Vol. 4" continues the captivating tale of Li Mu Bai and Yu Shu Lien with stunning visuals and deep storytelling. The blend of martial arts, mythology, and historical elements in ancient China is both thrilling and enriching. This volume adds more layers to the characters and the legendary Green Destiny sword, making it a must-read for fans of the series and newcomers alike.
